about_the_game: Remastered recordings of military marches tuned to fit the setting of End of War 1945.  A sampling of each faction's music is included, German, American, Italian, and Yugoslav Partisan and Nationalist recordings.  All the tracks are either from restored original recordings, or modern recordings tuned to a 78 RPM feel in terms of frequency range and overall feel. If you're a fan of history, this music is an excellent way to immerse yourself in the era. Over 40 tracks included!
detailed_description: Remastered recordings of military marches tuned to fit the setting of End of War 1945. All the tracks are either from restored original recordings, or modern recordings tuned to a 78 RPM feel in terms of frequency range and overall feel. If you're a fan of history, this music is an excellent way to immerse yourself in the era. Over 40 tracks included!

name: End of War 1945 Soundtrack

Minimum:

  • Storage (high-quality audio): Additional 240 MB available space
